snippet: The Senate Judiciary Committee heard testimony Monday arguing that a visa program that allows workers in high-tech fields to enter the United States discriminates against women.
lead_paragraph: The Senate Judiciary Committee heard testimony Monday arguing that a visa program that allows workers in high-tech fields to enter the United States discriminates against women.

headline.main: Gender Bias Seen in Visas for Skilled Workers
headline.print_headline: Gender Bias Seen in Visas for Skilled Workers
